sentences.en: A billing address is according to your registered home address.
sentences.cn: 邮寄地址与你注册的家庭住址一致.

sentences.en: A catfight has erupted over who will get top billing.
sentences.cn: 为了谁做主角的问题爆发了一场吵闹。

sentences.en: Are you going to bill me for this?
sentences.cn: 你会为这开帐单给我吗？

sentences.en: At the same time, universal insurance billing rate continued to drop.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 万能险的结算利率持续下降.

sentences.en: Billing Service will take effect in approximately 6 weeks.
sentences.cn: 综合帐单服务大约在六星期内生效.

sentences.en: Fast developing telecommunication industry requires excellent management and billing system , country.
sentences.cn: 快速发展的电信事业要求高水平的管理和计费系统.

sentences.en: Follow up network query to ensure the billing issues are solved quickly.
sentences.cn: 跟进网络查询,确保帐单问题得到快速解决.

sentences.en: He paid his bill for the newspapers promptly.
sentences.cn: 他立刻付了报纸的帐单。

sentences.en: Maintained and updated database to ensure accuracy of billing for equipment.
sentences.cn: 维持及补充资料库最新资料,以确保有关设备的帐单正确.

sentences.en: Make sure all the checkouts with balance have supporting document for billing.
sentences.cn: 确保结帐票据的金额与发票金额一致.

sentences.en: My several letters to your billing department havehad no results.
sentences.cn: 我写了几封信给你们的清帐部门,毫无结果.

sentences.en: Please keep all of your billing information up to date.
sentences.cn: 请保存好您的账单,以便在获得我们的帮助时提供.

sentences.en: Reception staff to provide 24 - hour reception, information, billing and messaging services.
sentences.cn: 接待人员24小时提供接待 、 问询 、 结帐和留言服务.

sentences.en: They couldn't afford to pay the bills.
They sat there billing and cooing till after midnight.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在那里窃窃私语直到后半夜.

sentences.en: This level also responsible for ensuring the appropriate billing of users.
sentences.cn: 这一级也有责任确保适当的计费用户.

sentences.en: With JAVA development, billing inquiries server actual prototype development, a good code.
sentences.cn: 用JAVA开发, 计费查询服务器原型开发实战, 不错的代码.

sentences.en: You know you might lose your billing in the blue book?
sentences.cn: 是的,要知道也许你们会漏了名人录上的演员表?

words.tran_cn: [法] 法案；广告；[会计] 帐单；[金融] 票据；钞票；清单
宣布；开帐单；用海报宣传
广告；记帐；开发票；演员表；总账款

phrases.tran_cn: 账单地址；寄付帐单地址；送订单的地址

trans.tran_cn: （节目单或戏院大门上的）演员表，（演员表上的）演员次序，开具账单，营业额
trans.tran_en: A bill is a written statement of money that you owe for goods or services
If you bill someone for goods or services you have provided them with, you give or send them a bill stating how much money they owe you for these goods or services
